amendment.description: Amendment requires large companies to submit a subcontracting plan prior to being awarded an Iraq reconstruction contract.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any funds in the bill from being used for any contract in contravention of section 8 (d) (6) of the Small Business Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
